name: ListCustomerProfiles
description:
Retrieve customer profiles from a Square account.

Use this tool to list customer profiles linked to a Square account. It is useful when you need to access or manage customer data stored on Square. Newly created or updated profiles may take up to a minute to be available for listing during network incidents.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: A pagination cursor from a previous request to retrieve the next set of results.

value_schema.description:
A pagination cursor returned by a previous call to this endpoint.
Provide this cursor to retrieve the next set of results for your original query.

For more information, see [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination).

parameters.name: max_results_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of customer profiles to retrieve in a single page. Must be between 1 and 100. Default is 100.

value_schema.description:
The maximum number of results to return in a single page. This limit is advisory. The response might contain more or fewer results.
If the specified limit is less than 1 or greater than 100, Square returns a `400 VALUE_TOO_LOW` or `400 VALUE_TOO_HIGH` error. The default value is 100.

For more information, see [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination).

parameters.name: customer_sort_field
parameters.description: Specifies the field by which customers should be sorted. Options: 'DEFAULT' or 'CREATED_AT'. Default is 'DEFAULT'.

value_schema.description:
Indicates how customers should be sorted.

The default value is `DEFAULT`.

parameters.name: customer_sort_order
parameters.description: Specify sorting order for customers: 'ASC' for ascending or 'DESC' for descending. Default is 'ASC'.

value_schema.description:
Indicates whether customers should be sorted in ascending (`ASC`) or
descending (`DESC`) order.

The default value is `ASC`.

parameters.name: include_total_customer_count
parameters.description: Set to true to include the total customer count in the response. Default is false.

value_schema.description:
Indicates whether to return the total count of customers in the `count` field of the response.

The default value is `false`.
